## EventPayload.browserAgent property

Information about the visitors device and browser.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        browser?: string;
        browserVersion?: string;
        os?: string;
        osVersion?: string;
        device?: string;
        deviceClass?: string;
        userAgent?: string;
    };
```
